data.text: Ngeche mag Solomon:
Mwandu moyudi e yo marach onge gi ohala;
Jehova Nyasaye ok we ngʼat makare obed gi kech,
Lwedo manyap miyo ngʼato bedo jachan,
Ngʼat makayo cham e kinde oro en wuowi mariek,
Gweth sidho kondo mar loch ewi ngʼat makare,
Paro miparogo ngʼat makare nobed gweth,
Ngʼat mariek e chunye rwako chike,
Ngʼat mobidhore wuotho kaonge luoro,
Ngʼat madiemo wangʼe giwuond kelo kuyo,
Dho ngʼat makare en soko mar ngima,
Sigu kelo miero,
Rieko iyudo e dho jogo mongʼeyo tiend wach,
Joma riek okano ngʼeyo,
Mwandu mar jomoko e ohinga mochiel motegno ma gigengʼorego,
Pok joma kare kelonegi ngima,
Ngʼat mawinjo weche mirieyego wuotho e yo madhiyo e ngima,
Ngʼatno mapando sigu manie chunye,
Ka weche ngʼeny, to richo ok nyal bare ma ok obetie,
Lew ngʼat makare en fedha mowal,
Dho ngʼat makare konyo ji mangʼeny,
Gweth mar Jehova Nyasaye kelo mwandu,
Ngʼat mofuwo yudo mor e timbe maricho,
Gima ngʼat marach oluoro biro loye;
Ka auka mager ofuto, to joricho otieko;
Mana kaka kong awayo machamo lak kendo ka iro malungo wenge,
Luoro Jehova Nyasaye miyo idak amingʼa,
Geno mar joma kare en mor,
Yor Jehova Nyasaye e kar pondo ni joma kare,
Joma kare ok nopudh ngangʼ,
Dho joma kare kelo rieko,
Lew joma kare ongʼeyo gima owinjore,
